name: Atreides Sympathizers
perks: +5 Landsraad Standing per Landsraad Information level, on Council opening
+2 Influence production

childs.name: Diplomatic Maneuvers
perks: Minor Houses deliver a House Gift near Arrakeen after every Council
Unlocks the Political Agreement Treaty
Unlocks the Landsraad Quarters in Arrakeen

childs.name: Political Entente
perks: When another faction betrays a Truce with House Atreides, receive 5 free Landsraad Guard
Unlocks the Council Chamber Building in Arrakeen

childs.name: Landsraad Support
perks: +50 max Influence per Agent assigned to a Landsraad Information slot
+1 Agent slot in Landsraad Information

childs.name: Insider Trading
perks: +20% CHOAM Share selling price
Selling CHOAM Shares grants 1 Influence per Share

childs.name: Spying Logistic
perks: Allows the training of Assassin
+200% Agent recruitment speed
Unlocks the Intelligence Agency Building in Arrakeen

childs.name: Sustainable Spying
perks: Agents assigned on CHOAM Information
Landsraad Information, or Spacing Guild Information slots produce +100% of their associated resources
Agent traits present only once on an Information field apply their effects twice

childs.name: Spying Mastery
perks: -50% impact from number of Agents on the time to recruit a new one
+5 max Agents

childs.name: Active Surveillance
perks: +1 Influence and Intel production per Agent assigned to Counterintelligence
+1 Agent slot in Counterintelligence
